survey_brief: Assess customer satisfaction with pet grooming services to identify improvement opportunities and measure loyalty metrics.

questions.question_text: How often do you use our pet grooming services?
questions.client_notes: Place first to filter non-users early. Ensure mobile-friendly dropdown if space constrained.
questions.scripter_notes: Single-choice radio buttons. Implement skip logic to Q12 on 'Never' selection.

script.question_text: How often do you use our pet grooming services?

questions.question_text: How satisfied are you with the overall quality of our grooming services?
questions.client_notes: Use standard 5-point Likert scale. Consider randomizing scale order to reduce bias.

script.question_text: How satisfied are you with the overall quality of our grooming services?

questions.question_text: Which grooming services have you used? (Select all that apply)
questions.client_notes: Randomize option order. Limit selections to 5 maximum.

script.question_text: Which grooming services have you used? (Select all that apply)

questions.question_text: What do you value most about our grooming services?
questions.client_notes: Optional open-ended question. Limit to 200 characters.

script.question_text: What do you value most about our grooming services?

questions.question_text: How would you rate the friendliness and professionalism of our staff?
questions.client_notes: Consider reverse scale to check response consistency.
questions.scripter_notes: Single-choice radio buttons with visual smiley-face scale.

script.question_text: How would you rate the friendliness and professionalism of our staff?

questions.question_text: How would you rate the cleanliness of our facility?
questions.client_notes: Critical quality metric. Include 'Prefer not to answer' if needed.
questions.scripter_notes: Single-choice radio buttons with star rating visual.

script.question_text: How would you rate the cleanliness of our facility?

questions.question_text: What additional services would you like us to offer? (Select all that apply)
questions.client_notes: Include exploratory market research options. Randomize order.

script.question_text: What additional services would you like us to offer? (Select all that apply)

questions.question_text: How do you feel about our pricing compared to the value received?
questions.client_notes: Include neutral midpoint. Consider comparative pricing benchmarks.
questions.scripter_notes: Single-choice radio buttons with currency symbols.

script.question_text: How do you feel about our pricing compared to the value received?

questions.question_text: What specific improvements would you suggest for our services?
questions.client_notes: Optional feedback. Use sentiment analysis in reporting.

script.question_text: What specific improvements would you suggest for our services?

questions.question_text: How likely are you to recommend our services to others? (0-10 scale)
questions.client_notes: Standard NPS question. Label endpoints: 'Not at all likely' to 'Extremely likely'.
questions.scripter_notes: Single-choice radio buttons in horizontal layout.

script.question_text: How likely are you to recommend our services to others? (0-10 scale)

questions.question_text: How did you first hear about our grooming services? (Select all that apply)
questions.client_notes: Critical for marketing attribution. Allow multiple selections.

script.question_text: How did you first hear about our grooming services? (Select all that apply)

questions.question_text: Please share any additional comments about your experience:
questions.client_notes: Final optional feedback. Use for qualitative insights.
questions.scripter_notes: Open-text field with expandable text area.

script.question_text: Please share any additional comments about your experience:
